text: I will present a paper on digital social protection and social cohesion at a workshop on Digital Technology and Sustainable Development at Oxford University on September 30 - October 1, 2024.
I will participate in a workshop at the White House Office of Science and Technology Policy on Participatory Algorithmic Design on July 29,2024.
I will give a talk at Microsoft on expanding data privacy based on my dissatation research in Togo on July 22, 2024
